Detailed Description

Thread specific storage.

Implemented with pthread at the moment since it should work before a JTCInitialize object has been created.

Definition at line 409 of file ISABThread.h.

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef pthread_key_t ISABTSS::TSSKey
 

The key type.

Keys are used to access thread specific storage.
